node.detail_zh: 患者於 1 月 31 日至 2 月 24 日跟數名患者參加同一印度旅行團，有長期病患，居於元朗十八鄉路 83 號原築 1 座。她沒有出現病徵，因被列作密切接觸者昨日被安排入住檢疫中心。其深喉唾液樣本於 3 月 8 日證實對病毒呈陽性反應，已獲安排入住伊利沙伯醫院接受治療。患者同住的家人沒有出現病徵，丈夫正接受檢疫，而兒子、女兒及家庭傭工將被安排接受檢疫。
node.detail_en: The paitent joined the same tour to India as patients with some patients from Jan 31 to Feb 24. The patient, with long term illness, lives in Block 1, La Grove, 83 Shap Pat Heung Road, Yuen Long. She was asymptomatic and sent to the quarantine centre as a close contact on Mar 7. Her deep throat saliva specimen was tested positive on Mar 8 and was arranged to Queen Elizabeth Hospital for management. Her family members who live with her are all asymptomatic. Her husband is quarantined while her son, daughter and domestic helper will be arranged for quarantine.
node.group_description_zh: 5 名患者於 1 月 31 日至 2 月 24 日參加旅行團到印度旅遊，及後旅行團團友的家及家傭先後確診。
node.group_description_en: 5 patients joined a group tour to India on Jan 31 to Feb 24, whose families and domestic helpers were found to be positive to the coronavirus.

node.location_zh: 十八鄉路 83 號原築 1 座
node.location_en: La Grove Tower 1, 83 Shap Pat Heung Road

node.remarks_zh: 患者為第105、107 、110 及 111 宗患者的團友
node.remarks_en: Joined the same tour group as patients no. 105, 107, 110 & 111
